description:
Become one of the first Nintendo Switchâ„¢ Outlanders! 
Sign up for the limited Closed Beta: vigorgame.com/switch

Warning: the Closed Beta doesn't represent the final state of the product.

Vigor is a free-to-play shoot 'n' loot game where you build the Shelter in post-war Norway. 

* Shoot your way out of encounters for 8-12 players
* Loot precious resources and valuable items
* Build your shelter and vital equipment
* Become the courageous Outlander in post-war Norway
name: Vigor - Closed Beta
intro: Vigor is a free-to-play shoot 'n' loot game where you build the Shelter in post-war Norway
